name: I'll Be Ping! For Christmas
description:
The famous strategic maze game Ping! returns with an all-new free holiday sequel! Enjoy twelve levels of present-collecting and baddie bombing, including two boss stages!

Supports keyboard controls and gamepad (Xbox 360 and Evercade Vs controllers tested)

Current known bugs:

  • Thieves do not award points when defeated
  • Some music may have trouble switching to the next track 
  • Final boss name is the wrong font for a brief moment
  • ESC key must be used to return to title screen from instructions
